CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper April 14, 1973, pg. 26, reads: "Extremely Talented - These young students attending Westinghouse High School call themselves the 'Shadows of Love.' Not only are they lovely and vivacious, but extremely talented as well. Left to right: Cecilia Johnson, Abbey Smith, Renee Edmonds, Vivian Hawkes, Melinda Smalls and April Rose. Down front on the left is Mrs. Birdie Nickles, director. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Westinghouse High School students and members of "The Shadows of Love" Cecilia Johnson, Abbey Smith, Renee Edmonds, Vivian Hawkes, Melinda Smalls and April Rose wearing bell bottoms and Afros, singing on stage with backdrop reading "Looking Through the Windows of Soul," with director Birdie Nickles on left
